template.name: Template SNMP UPS Delta
template.description:
SNMP Template for Zabbix 4.0+
Tested on Delta RT-1K

item.name: Battery Charge
item.description: An estimate of the battery charge remaining expressed as a percent of full charge.

item.name: Battery Charge Status
item.description: Representing the battery charge status. floating(0) charging(1) resting(2) discharging(3)

item.name: Battery Temperature
item.description: The ambient temperature at or near the UPS Battery casing.

item.name: Battery Estimated Time
item.description: Estimated time from backup to low battery shutdown.

item.name: Battery Voltage
item.description: The magnitude of the present battery voltage in 1/10 V. Preprocessed.

item.name: Bypass Power
item.description: The bypass line 1 real power of the UPS system in watts.

item.name: Bypass Voltage
item.description: The bypass line 1 voltage of the UPS system in 1/10 V. Preprocessed.

item.name: Serial Number
item.description: The serial number of the connected UPS.

item.name: Input Voltage
item.description: The Input line 1 voltage of the UPS system in 1/10 V. Preprocessed.

item.name: Battery Last Replacement Date
item.description: The last battery replacement date. The format is YYYYMMDD. Preprocessed.

item.name: Output Load
item.description: The current UPS output line 1 load expressed in percent of rated capacity.

item.name: Output Power
item.description: The Output line 1 real power of the UPS system in watts.

item.name: Output Source
item.description: The present source of output power. The enumeration none(7) indicates that there is no source of output power (and therefore no output power), for example, the system has opened the output breaker. normal(0) battery(1) bypass(2) reducing(3) boosting(4) manualBypass(5) other(6) none(7) on_eco(8)

item.name: Output Voltage
item.description: The Output line 1 voltage of the UPS system in 1/10 V. Preprocessed.

item.name: Seconds on Battery
item.description: If the unit is on battery power, the elapsed time since the UPS last switched to battery power, or the time since the network management subsystem was last restarted, whichever is less. Zero shall be returned if the unit is not on battery power.

trigger.name: Battery espimated time is less than 10 minutes
UPS started to work on battery
